Reporting Approach World Class Governance Corporate Citizenship Care for Our Environment Overview Our Response to Covid- 19
Environmentally-Conscious Catering
54In June 2020, AerCap’s Dublin office introduced the use of food containers that are organic and recyclable. 
As a result, almost 80% of all waste generated at AerCap House is either recycled or composted
